Burs 2015/KER/17184 K. SURENDRA MOHAN,J. ~CrLM.C.NO.19530F 2015. "Dated this the 17 April, 2015. ORDER The petitioners, accused in crime No:714/2011 of Chavara Police Station for offences under Section 498(A), 323, 324 read with Section 34 of the Indian Penal Code have filed this petition under Section 482 of the Code of Criminal Procedure for quashing the proceedings pending against them. The crime is at present pending as C.C.450/2015 of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court, Chavara. The case of the petitioners is that, the disputes have been amicably settled between the petitioners and the second respondent. The Family Cout has also passed a decree of divorce. Therefore, the petitioners seek the issue of orders quashing the criminal proceedings that are pending. BRS 2015/KER/I7184 Crl.M.C.1953/2015 2 2.Adv.A.Mohammed Raffi appears for the second respondent. The counsel also submits that the disputes have been settled and that, there is no objection to the proceedings being quashed. The Public Prosecutor does not voice any other objections. This Criminal M.C. Is therefore allowed. All further proceedings in C.C.450/2015 pending before the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court, Chavara are quashed. Sd/- K. SURENDRA MOHAN Judge jj /True copy/ Bie 2015/KER/7184 Cri.M.C.1953/2015 3
